docs.text: Welcome to Virginia Tech's OnDemand Configuration Pages This site will describe our configuration as much for our internal consumption as it will be to share with others our setup. VT OnDemand Portal Customizations Dashboard Files app ... VT Remote Desktop Our remote desktop app is a fully containerized desktop.
